message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I need to make a profit. I can meet you halfway at $11500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $11000?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to go down to $11250, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10500?
